title: Freedmen's Bureau Records: W. Storer How to Orlando Brown, February 3, 1866
summary: How's monthly report refers to a case in Augusta County of E. P. Walton, described in detail in Tukey's report to How. How also refers to the problems resulting from the lack of a sufficient military presence in the region and requests a military detachment to be stationed in Staunton. Such a detachment would then be capable of deploying to surrounding counties when necessary.
keywords: Military Authority, Violence/Crime, Legal System, American Civil War
